verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4404>morning<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G4160>held<s%> a <S%G4824>consultation<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4892>council,<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and carried him <S%G667>away,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> him to <S%G4091>Pilate.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1488>Art<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews?<s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> <S%G3004>sayest<s%> it.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2723>accused<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> of many <S%G4183>things:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G611>Answerest<s%> <S%G3756>thou<s%> <S%G3762>nothing?<s%> <S%G2396>behold<s%> how many <S%G4214>things<s%> they witness <S%G2649>against<s%> <S%G4675>thee.<s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3765>yet<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3762>nothing;<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2296>marveled.<s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2596>at<s%> that <S%G1859>feast<s%> he <S%G630>released<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner,<s%> <S%G3746>whomsoever<s%> they <S%G154>desired.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> one <S%G3004>named<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas,<s%> which lay <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> them that had made insurrection with <S%G4955>him,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> had <S%G4160>committed<s%> <S%G5408>murder<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4714>insurrection.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> crying <S%G310>aloud<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G154>desire<s%> him to do <S%G2531>as<s%> he had <S%G104>ever<s%> <S%G4160>done<s%> unto <S%G846>them.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2309>Will<s%> ye that I <S%G630>release<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews?<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> had <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G5355>envy.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G383>moved<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> unto <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> ye <S%G3767>then<s%> that I shall <S%G4160>do<s%> unto him <S%G3739>whom<s%> ye <S%G3004>call<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews?<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> cried <S%G2896>out<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G4717>Crucify<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1063>Why,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> hath he <S%G4160>done?<s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> cried <S%G2896>out<s%> the more <S%G4056>exceedingly,<s%> <S%G4717>Crucify<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> so <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> <S%G1014>willing<s%> to <S%G4160>content<s%> <S%G2425><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G630>released<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> when he had <S%G5417>scourged<s%> him, <S%G2443>to<s%> be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> led him <S%G520>away<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2080>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G833>hall,<s%> <S%G3603>called<s%> <S%G4232>Praetorium;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they call <S%G4779>together<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4686>band.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they clothed him <S%G1746>with<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4209>purple,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4120>plaited<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G174>thorns,<s%> and put it <S%G4060>about<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> head,
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5463>Hail,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews!<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G5180>smote<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> with a <S%G2563>reed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> did spit <S%G1716>upon<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5087>bowing<s%> their <S%G1119>knees<s%> <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they had <S%G1702>mocked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they took <S%G1562>off<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4209>purple<s%> from <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> put his own clothes <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G2440><s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> led him <S%G1806>out<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4717>crucify<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G29>compel<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> a <S%G2956>Cyrenian,<s%> who passed <S%G3855>by,<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G68>country,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G223>Alexander<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4504>Rufus,<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G142>bear<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4716>cross.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G5342>bring<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G1115>Golgotha,<s%> which <S%G3603>is,<s%> being <S%G3177>interpreted,<s%> The <S%G5117>place<s%> of a <S%G2898>skull.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> mingled with <S%G4669>myrrh:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> it <S%G3756>not.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they had <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they <S%G1266>parted<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garments,<s%> <S%G906>casting<s%> <S%G2819>lots<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> what every <S%G5101>man<s%> <S%G5101><s%> should <S%G142>take.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1923>superscription<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G156>accusation<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> written <S%G1924>over,<s%> <S%G3588>THE<s%> <S%G935>KING<s%> OF <S%G3588>THE<s%> <S%G2453>JEWS.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> they <S%G4717>crucify<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3027>thieves;<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> his right <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1520>other<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2176>left.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> which <S%G3004>saith,<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> he was <S%G3049>numbered<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G459>transgressors.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they that passed <S%G3899>by<s%> railed <S%G987>on<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2795>wagging<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2776>heads,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3758>Ah,<s%> thou that <S%G2647>destroyest<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3618>buildest<s%> it <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%>
Save <S%G4982><s%> <S%G4572>thyself,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4716>cross.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3668>Likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G1702>mocking<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G240>themselves<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> He <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G243>others;<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> he <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G4982>save.<s%>

Let <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G2597>descend<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4716>cross,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4100>believe.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> they that were crucified <S%G4957>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3679>reviled<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> at <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G994>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Eloi, <S%G1682><s%> <S%G1682>Eloi,<s%> <S%G2982>lama<s%> sabachthani? <S%G4518><s%> which <S%G3603>is,<s%> being <S%G3177>interpreted,<s%> <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> hast thou <S%G1459>forsaken<s%> <S%G3165>me?<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of them that stood <S%G3936>by,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> it, <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> he <S%G5455>calleth<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5143>ran<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> filled a sponge <S%G1072>full<s%> <S%G4699><s%> of <S%G3690>vinegar,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> put it <S%G4060>on<s%> a <S%G2563>reed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> gave him to <S%G4222>drink,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Let <S%G863>alone;<s%> let us <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> to take him <S%G2507>down.<s%> <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G863>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and gave up the <S%G1606>ghost.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2665>veil<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G4977>rent<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1417>twain<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G509>top<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G2736>bottom.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2760>centurion,<s%> which <S%G3936>stood<s%> over <S%G1537>against<s%> <S%G1727><s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G3779>so<s%> cried <S%G2896>out,<s%> and gave up the <S%G1606>ghost,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G230>Truly<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

There <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> looking <S%G2334>on<s%> afar <S%G575>off:<s%> <S%G3113><s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3398>less<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2500>Joses,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4539>Salome;<s%>

(Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>him;)<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> other <S%G243>women<s%> which came up <S%G4872>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> when the <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G3904>preparation,<s%> that <S%G3603>is,<s%> the day before the <S%G4315>sabbath,<s%>

Joseph <S%G2501><s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G707>Arimathaea,<s%> an <S%G2158>honorable<s%> <S%G1010>counselor,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> waited <S%G2258>for<s%> <S%G4327><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and went <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G5111>boldly<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G154>craved<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2296>marveled<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he were already <S%G2348>dead:<s%> <S%G2235><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4341>calling<s%> unto him <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2760>centurion,<s%> he <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> he had been any while <S%G599>dead.<s%> <S%G3819><s%>
